author: Choo Han Teck J:
casename: Re Raffles Town Club Pte Ltd
counsel: David Chong Gek Sian (Principal Senior State Counsel) and Janice Wong for the Attorney-General; K Shanmugam SC, Muthu Arusu and Tay Yong Seng (Allen & Gledhill LLP) for the Applicant; Foo Hui Min (Inland Revenue Authority of Singapore) for the Comptroller of Income Tax
tags-parsed: Administrative Law/Judicial review/Whether s 79(3) of Income Tax Act (Cap 134, 2008 Rev Ed) preventing taxpayer from seeking judicial review on appointment of chairman and deputy chairman of Income Tax Board of Review
Administrative Law/Natural justice/Apparent bias/Whether deputy chairman of Income Tax Board of Review ought not to sit because of his prior resignation from membership in taxpayer
